register.patientRegisterInfo: Please fill out the form below for a quick background briefing. It will help us match you with the most suitable online provider.
register.therapistRegisterInfo: We are happy to have you. Please fill in the form below to register.

home.homeIntroTitleH4: Your mental well-being is just a click away. Find solace and support anytime, anywhere with our online therapy app.
home.homeFaqQuestion1: How Do  I Schedule an appointment?
home.homeFaqQuestion2: Are the therapist at BunnaMind qualified?
home.homeFaqQuestion3: Can I change the therapist if I needed?
home.homeFaqQuestion4: Is online therapy suitable for everyone?
home.homeFaqAnswer1: Sign up and fill in our initial form. We then will label your best matching therapists based on the answers provided. You can either select from there or browse manually, see their available time slots, book a slot, purchase a session, and youâ€™re ready to go
home.homeFaqAnswer2: Yes, all the therapists at Bunnamind are highly qualified and licensed professionals. They have extensive experience in various areas of mental health
home.homeFaqAnswer3: Yes. If you feel the need to switch therapists, you can request a change through our platform, and select a therapist of your choice
home.homeFaqAnswer4: Online therapy is suitable for most individuals. Our therapists will assess your needs during the initial consultation and recommend the best course of action.
home.homeAboutUsTitle2: Bunna Mind is a comprehensive online therapy platform designed to help you achieve mental and emotional well-being from the comfort and convenience of your own space.
home.homeAboutUsDescription1: Our secure and user-friendly virtual platform brings theraphy to your fingertips.
home.homeAboutUsDescription2: Our team of experienced therapists specializes in a wide range of areas, including anxiety, depression, stress management, relationship issues, self-esteem, and more
home.homeAboutUsDescription3: At BunnaMind, we recognoze that each individual is unique, and there is no one-size-fits-all approach to therapy
home.homeAboutUsDescription4: We adhere to the highest standard of privacy and confidentiality to ensure that you feel safe and secure throughout your therapeutic journey.
home.homeContactUsTitle2: If you have any inquiry, concern, or commentary, please reach out by filling the form below.
